files.patch:
@@ -34,1 +34,0 @@
- * @requires (os.simpleArch == "x64")
@@ -43,1 +42,1 @@
-        TestFramework.runWithFlags("--add-modules=jdk.incubator.vector", "-ea", "-XX:UseAVX=0", "-XX:MaxVectorSize=8");
+        TestFramework.runWithFlags("--add-modules=jdk.incubator.vector", "-ea", "-XX:+IgnoreUnrecognizedVMOptions", "-XX:UseAVX=0", "-XX:MaxVectorSize=8");
@@ -48,2 +47,2 @@
-    @IR(failOn = {IRNode.ABS_VB}, applyIfAnd={"MaxVectorSize", " <= 8 ", "UseAVX", "0"})
-    @IR(counts = {IRNode.ABS_VB, "1"}, applyIf={"MaxVectorSize", " > 8 "})
+    @IR(failOn = {IRNode.ABS_VB}, applyIfAnd={"MaxVectorSize", " <= 8 ", "UseAVX", "0"}, applyIfCPUFeature={"sse4.1", "true"})
+    @IR(counts = {IRNode.ABS_VB, "1"}, applyIf={"MaxVectorSize", " > 8 "}, applyIfCPUFeature={"sse4.1", "true"})
